items.preText: Aiden Markram to partner Quinton de Kock tonight. Remember, there's no Hashim Amla for this game. The Bangladeshis run out onto the field. History will be made either way tonight. If South Africa give this chase a good crack, the World Cup would've finally arrived. It's going to be Mustafizur Rahman with the new ball. Let's go. 2.42pm Welcome back, folks. Is there a better way to banter than challenging your colleagues/friends/family over a simple little game? Just predict winners and stand a chance to win some fab prizes. Here goes. Of course this game's locked but you can take your picks for the games coming up.
items.text: Oooooh, good ball. Skiddy length ball, swerves in a hint, de Kock chops this wide of the stumps.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to de Kock, no run

items.text: defends back to the bowler as he shows the full face of the bat
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to de Kock, no run

items.text: pacy length ball that nips back in to thud into the thigh pad as he looks to work it square on the leg side
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to de Kock, no run

items.text: squirted off a thickish inside-edge to mid-on
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to de Kock, no run

items.text: cracking stroke! Punched, bounces over backward point's head and races away to the boundary.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to de Kock, FOUR runs

items.text: looks to work this behind square, but is done in by the bounce as he's hit on the thigh pad again. Good first over for Bangladesh
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to de Kock, no run

items.preText: Spin from the other end. It's Mehidy Hasan with his offspin. A slip in place for him.
items.text: squeezed to long-on, the length was a touch too full
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Markram, 1 run

items.text: edged and four! Goes for a square drive, but the turn means he gets a thick outside edge that races past slip and short third man.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to de Kock, FOUR runs

items.text: eases gently past the bowler to long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to de Kock, 1 run

items.text: shortish on middle and leg, punched to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Markram, 1 run

items.preText: Stuart asks: "All this doom and gloom: a side with Rabada and Tahir gave up 330+. So South Africa can't chase the same against a much lesser-known bowling unit?"
items.text: dabs to short third man for a quick single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to de Kock, 1 run

items.text: turns this to square leg as they get across for a quick single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Markram, 1 run

items.text: steers this length ball to point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Markram, no run

items.preText: aaqib: "Curious! Why isnt hashim playing today?" -- Rested as precaution. Was hit on the helmet by Jofra Archer in their tournament opener.
items.text: leans into the drive but can't quite caress it into the gap. Well stopped at point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Markram, no run

items.text: short of length ball on middle,  gets it to cut away and Markram defends back
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Markram, no run

items.text: tight line, angled across the batsman, around the fourth stump, defended
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Markram, no run

items.text: looks to ride the bounce and bunt this behind square, nearly chops on!
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Markram, no run

items.text: gorgeous! Too full and punished as he laces this into the gap at extra cover. Good effort by the fielder running back
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Markram, 2 runs

items.text: slider from around the stumps, tucks this to square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to de Kock, no run

items.text: gets well forward and defends solidly
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to de Kock, no run

items.text: a little too short and de Kock rocks back, making room to cut the ball off the stumps
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to de Kock, FOUR runs

items.text: slows it down, and tosses it up into the pads. de Kock blocks
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to de Kock, no run

items.text: draws him forward with a fullish delivery outside off, blocks
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to de Kock, no run

items.text: attempts an inside out drive as he sees the ball tossed up outside off. Can't hit the gap at cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to de Kock, no run

items.text: steps forward and blocks the fullish delivery on off stump
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Markram, no run
